data.title: 2019 MEDTEX Summit Asia ｜Accupass 活動通
authors: Accupass 活動通－發現身邊的有趣活動，找活動及辦活動首選
data.meta_description: MEDTEX Summit Asia is a forum where key opinion leaders and industry experts from Fortune 500 companies, VC, IT, pharma sectors come together with award-winning scholars having in-depth talks on healthcare that are being discussed fiercely worldwide
data.text:
2019 MEDTEX Summit Asia

MEDTEX Summit Asia is a forum where key opinion leaders and industry experts from Fortune 500 companies, VC, IT, pharma sectors come together with award-winning scholars having in-depth talks on healthcare that are being discussed fiercely worldwide

✧ Places at the MEDTEX are limited so book a place at your early convenience! Click here for more details on the MEDTEX：https://lihi1.com/aKbY2

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Admission：

Fee/Session

Early Bird

(~ 11/15)

Regular

(11/16 – 12/06)

General Admission

TWD 4800 (~USD 160)

TWD 6800 (~USD 230)

Students

TWD 3800 (~ USD 130)

TWD 5800 (~USD 200)

* Session I、II、III at the MEDTEX will be taking place concurrently. Please confirm the session you wish to attend.

*Students are required to show a valid student ID by the entrance.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note

Your event registration QR code, in print or an e-copy, is required for the entry.

❈ The organizers reserve the right to change the event program and accept or reject all entries to the event

台灣台北市7F, Hall 2, Taipei Nangang Exhibition Center (No. 2, Jingmao 2nd Road, Nangang District, Taipei City) ()

2019 MEDTEX Summit Asia Cell Therapy

innovation

smart healthcare

醫療科技
